name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a Senior Frontend Engineer with 8+ years of software engineering experience, I excel in building robust applications using **Angular**, **TypeScript**, and **SCSS**. My proficiency in modern frontend technologies encompasses **RxJS**, **NgRx**, **HTML5**, and testing frameworks like **Jest** and **Cypress** which enables me to deliver high-quality, maintainable code. I have extensive knowledge of **REST APIs** and **GraphQL** for seamless data integration. Experienced with cloud platforms such as **AWS** and **Azure**, I implement solutions that are scalable and reliable. I am skilled in adopting clean code principles, including **SOLID**, **DRY**, and **Domain-Driven Design**, ensuring efficient collaboration within teams. Additionally, my understanding of **OAuth2**, **OIDC**, and tools like **Auth0** allows me to fortify application security while engaging in effective team collaboration and communication.
